1100010100001001 0011111100001011 0 -> sum: 0000010000010100, cout: 1
0001100111111001 1110111001000110 0 -> sum: 0000100000111111, cout: 1
1010001111110100 0001101000101001 1 -> sum: 1011111000011110, cout: 0
0100100110100010 1001111000100001 0 -> sum: 1110011111000011, cout: 0
0110001100011110 1011101110100000 1 -> sum: 0001111010111111, cout: 1
1000100001111100 1010111111000100 0 -> sum: 0011100001000000, cout: 1

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
